channel.title: Dumb question
channel.description:
Hi, i'm new to SCAR, and i have problems with it. i downloaded the newest SCAR, then the newest SRL, but after i downloaded the SRL and extracted it to where it should be, i get this error when i try to run ANY script(even the setup one!):
Line 26: [Error] (42:1): Duplicate identifier 'UpChars' in script C:\ProgramFiles\SCAR 3.0\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar
What did i do wrong? (help please, sorry if this is wrong section, i couldnt find a better section for this. :( )

item.title: Dumb question
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Download the newest version of SCAR Divi, version 3.01 at me site (http://www.freddy1990.com/scar.php)
And instead of downloading SRL and manually installing it, use the Download SRL option in SCAR Divi, it downloads a version of SRL 3.6 which I modified to work with SCAR divi.

Read full topic
